00019 inline void nargchk(bool cond)
00020 {
00021     if (!cond)
00022         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");

00024 
00028 mxArray* ObjectDetection2Struct(
00029     const vector<LatentSvmDetector::ObjectDetection> vo,
00030     const vector<string>& classNames)
00031 {
00032     const char* fields[] = {"rect","score","class"};
00033     MxArray m(fields,3,1,vo.size());
00034     for (int i=0; i<vo.size(); ++i) {
00035         m.set("rect", vo[i].rect, i);
00036         m.set("score", vo[i].score, i);
00037         m.set("class", classNames[vo[i].classID], i);
00038     }
00039     return m;
00040 }

00042 } // local scope
00043 
00051 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00052                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00053 {
00054     nargchk(nrhs>=2 && nlhs<=2);
00055     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00056     int id = rhs[0].toInt();
00057     string method(rhs[1].toString());
00058     
00059     // Constructor call
00060     if (method == "new") {
00061         nargchk(nlhs<=1 && nrhs<=4);
00062         obj_[++last_id] = LatentSvmDetector();
00063         // Due to the buggy implementation of LatentSvmDetector in OpenCV
00064         // we cannot use the constructor syntax other than empty args.
00065         plhs[0] = MxArray(last_id);
00066         return;
00067     }
00068     
00069     // Big operation switch
00070     LatentSvmDetector& obj = obj_[id];
00071     if (method == "delete") {
00072         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs==0);
00073         obj_.erase(id);
00074     }
00075     else if (method == "clear") {
00076         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs==0);
00077         obj.clear();
00078     }
00079     else if (method == "empty") {
00080         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00081         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.empty());
00082     }
00083     else if (method == "load") {
00084         nargchk(nrhs<=4 && nlhs<=1);
00085         plhs[0] = (nrhs==3) ? MxArray(obj.load(rhs[2].toVector<string>())) :
00086             MxArray(obj.load(rhs[2].toVector<string>(), rhs[3].toVector<string>()));
00087     }
00088     else if (method == "detect") {
00089         nargchk(nrhs>=3 && (nrhs%2)==1 && nlhs<=1);
00090         Mat image((rhs[2].isUint8()) ? rhs[2].toMat() : rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00091         vector<LatentSvmDetector::ObjectDetection> objectDetections;
00092         float overlapThreshold=0.5f;
00093         int numThreads=-1;
00094         for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00095             string key(rhs[i].toString());
00096             if (key=="OverlapThreshold")
00097                 overlapThreshold = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00098             else if (key=="NumThreads")
00099                 numThreads = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00100             else
00101                 mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option %s", key.c_str());
00102         }
00103         obj.detect(image,objectDetections,overlapThreshold,numThreads);
00104         plhs[0] = ObjectDetection2Struct(objectDetections, obj.getClassNames());
00105     }
00106     else if (method == "getClassNames") {
00107         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00108         plhs[0] = MxArray(obj.getClassNames());
00109     }
00110     else if (method == "getClassCount") {
00111         nargchk(nrhs==2 && nlhs<=1);
00112         plhs[0] = MxArray(static_cast<int>(obj.getClassCount()));
00113     }
00114     else
00115         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized operation %s", method.c_str());
00116 }
